org.svvrl.goal.gui.tool

Class ToolBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JToolBar
            • org.svvrl.goal.gui.tool.ToolBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants, TabSwitchedListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AutomatonToolBox, ControllerToolBox, GeneralToolBox, InputSimulatorToolBox, QPTLToolBox, RunDagToolBox, RunTreeToolBox, SplitTreeToolBox

    public abstract class ToolBox
extends javax.swing.JToolBar
implements TabSwitchedListener
    A ToolBox is a tool bar containing a set of tools within the same button group. The tool box should make itself invisible if the active tab is not supported by this tool box.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • tabSwitched

        public void tabSwitched(Tab tab)
        Description copied from interface: TabSwitchedListener
        Invoked when the active tab in a GOAL window has been switched. Note that the new active tab may be null because there is no tab in the window.
        Specified by:
